overview: "Empty Chatter" is an animated film about a girl whose head is separated from her body and replaced by other heads. The purpose of the cartoon is to portray a personal, not denominational way of thinking, the essence of which is to ignore everyday life and share their identity and behavior in various social networks. It is a reflection of the dissociation from self and intimacy in relationships that arises in response to the hyper-mediated modern life.
title: Babble Bubble
